author: Helen I
title: A tranquil tropical oasis.
text:
We enjoyed our night at this pretty small hotel in Kampala, where we were welcomed by friendly staff. The design and decor are lovely, with the rooms nestled around lush tropical gardens and a tiny pool. The rooms are comfortable with efficient air conditioning and small private verandahs. An extensive breakfast was served elegantly with beautiful tableware and crockery at the breakfast room open to the pool, or at tables by the pool if one prefers. We enjoyed a very good dinner in the adjacent hotel restaurant. The hotel is very close to a mall with a few good cafes, shops and restaurants.
